title: , 44 , 45 , 46 , 47 , 50 and 63 of the Employment Permits Act 2024 (No. 17 of
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as 

the Employment Permits 

(Amendment) (No. 4) Regulations 2024.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited employment permit (amendment) (no 4) regulation 2024

title: , 44 , 45 , 46 , 47 , 50 and 63 of the Employment Permits Act 2024 (No. 17 of
heading: In these Regulations “Principal Regulations” means the Employment
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations “Principal Regulations” means the Employment 

Permits Regulations 2024 (S.I No. 444 of 2024).
text_norm: 2 regulation principal regulation mean employment permit regulation 2024 (s.i no 444 2024)

title: , 44 , 45 , 46 , 47 , 50 and 63 of the Employment Permits Act 2024 (No. 17 of
heading: 3. Regulation 16 of the Principal Regulations is amended by substituting
text_raw:
3. Regulation 16 of the Principal Regulations is amended by substituting 

“Regulations 46, 53, and 70” for “Regulations 49 and 80”.
text_norm: 3 regulation 16 principal regulation amended substituting regulation 46 53 70 regulation 49 80

title: , 44 , 45 , 46 , 47 , 50 and 63 of the Employment Permits Act 2024 (No. 17 of
heading: 4. Regulation 43(a) of the Principal Regulations is amended—
text_raw:
4. Regulation 43(a) of the Principal Regulations is amended— 

(a) by substituting “Regulation 42(1)(a)” for “Regulation 43(1)(a)”, 

and 

(b) by substituting “Regulation 42(1)(b)” for “Regulation 43(1)(b)”.
text_norm: 4 regulation 43(a) principal regulation amended-- (a) substituting regulation 42(1)(a) regulation 43(1)(a) (b) substituting regulation 42(1)(b) regulation 43(1)(b)

title: , 44 , 45 , 46 , 47 , 50 and 63 of the Employment Permits Act 2024 (No. 17 of
heading: 5. The Principal Regulations are amended by re-numbering—
text_raw:
5. The Principal Regulations are amended by re-numbering— 

(a) 

the second Regulation numbered 65, with the heading “Minimum 
amount of remuneration payable under sports and cultural 
employment permit”, as Regulation 66, 

(b) Regulation 66 as Regulation 67, 

(c) Regulation 67 as Regulation 68, 

(d) Regulation 68 as Regulation 69, 

(e) Regulation 69 as Regulation 70, 

(f) Regulation 70 as Regulation 71, 

(g) Regulation 71 as Regulation 72, and 

(h) Regulation 72 as Regulation 73.
text_norm: 5 principal regulation amended re-numbering-- (a) second regulation numbered 65 heading minimum amount remuneration payable sport cultural employment permit regulation 66 (b) regulation 66 regulation 67 (c) regulation 67 regulation 68 (d) regulation 68 regulation 69 (e) regulation 69 regulation 70 (f) regulation 70 regulation 71 (g) regulation 71 regulation 72 (h) regulation 72 regulation 73

title: , 44 , 45 , 46 , 47 , 50 and 63 of the Employment Permits Act 2024 (No. 17 of
heading: 6. Schedule 5 to the Principal Regulations is amended—
text_raw:
6. Schedule 5 to the Principal Regulations is amended— 

(a) 

in the entry for “Car mechanic, Motor mechanic, Auto electrician, 
Motor vehicle technician”— 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 5th November, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [598] 3 

(i) 

(ii) 

in column 2, by substituting “200” for “6”, and 

in column 3, by substituting “30th October 2024” for “2nd 
September 2024”, and 

(b) 

 in column 2 of the entry for “Sea fisher in the Irish fishing fleet”, 
by substituting “150” for “884”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

30 October, 2024. 

PETER BURKE, 

Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment.
